text: The gardens of the Eyrignac manor are located in Salignac-Eyvigues, in the Dordogne, in the Périgord noir (New Aquitaine region). They received the Remarkable Garden label in 2005 and have been included in the additional list of Historic Monuments of the 17th and 18th centuries since 1986. They are located not far from the Caves of Lascaux and Sarlat-la- Canéda.http://www.eyrignac.com/ == References == Category:Botanical gardens in Europe
title: Jardins du manoir d'Eyrignac
